ApplicationNotepad.Notes:
About this Sample Application

For use with Logi Info and Logi Report v11.3+

This sample demonstrates a variety of Chart Canvas Charts and advanced development techniques, including:

  • Bar, Bubble, Pie, and Scatter chart series
  • Bar and Indicator gauges 
  • Tabs and AJAX refresh of report sections
  • Use of Subreports
  • Use of a custom theme 
  • Use of custom Quicktips with charts

The report definitions use included Excel data files as a data source and no connection to a database server is required.

This application is provided freely for your use as a demonstration of the techniques available in Logi reports. It was developed using v12.1.188 of our product; use with earlier versions may result in different output.

System Requirements

To run this sample, the system must have the following components installed:

  • Internet Information Server (IIS) or supported Java-based web server
  • .NET Framework version appropriate to your Logi Info version, or JDK 1.6-1.8
  • Logi Info

3.14.16
